name: Parallax Slider Block
author: WPDeveloper

sections.description:
Parallax Slider is a great way to create a captivating visual experience for your website visitors. It will help you to impress your audience with an amazing effect and also reduce page scroll time.

Using parallax scrolling effect in the slider, you can add to the sense of immersion in the virtual experience. You don‚Äôt need any coding to create parallax slider effect just install this block plugin & use this animation from Block Editor

Completely Customizable: You can customize the images, speed, effect etc. to make it suitable for your website design

Super Light-weight: No extra resources used and it’s highly optimized for super fast loading & instant Live editing.

Dedicated Support: We‚Äôve an extraordinary support team ready to help you. Ask your questions in the support forum, we‚Äôll get back to you immediately.

sections.installation:
Modern Way:

  1. Go to the WordPress Block/Gutenberg Editor
  2. Search For “Slider Block”.
  3. Install in 1-click

Old Way:

  1. Upload parallax-slider-block to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Follow the Documentation
sections.faq:
Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any standard WordPress theme.
